title: Open URLs in default browser
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
When i open links in Teams (via Ctrl-LeftClick) it will open a new small window. Is it possible to open the link in the default browser? The official teams app opens the url in the default browser.
OS: Ubuntu 20.10
Version: 1.0.9
Installed via: .deb package

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Open the link via default browser.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
-

**Additional context**
-
